com.ardock.moodapp.moodgen.lib.ui.utils

Class MoodockTabHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ardock.moodapp.moodgen.lib.ui.utils.BaseTabHelper
      • com.ardock.moodapp.moodgen.lib.ui.utils.SliderTabHelper
        • com.ardock.moodapp.moodgen.lib.ui.utils.MaterialTabHelper
          • com.ardock.moodapp.moodgen.lib.ui.utils.MoodockTabHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMoodockUIHelper

    public abstract class MoodockTabHelper
extends MaterialTabHelper
implements IMoodockUIHelper
    MoodockTabHelper is a slider helper class for your project that: Initialize and close Moodock persistence. Inherited: Get the previous tabview position of the actual position. save/load/reset the base settings preferences. save/load/reset the extra settings preferences. save/load/reset all utils preferences. Get/Set an util preference. Get/Set a setting preference.
